## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas

- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the relevant documentation in /Docs (if needed)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Security

- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or sensitive data
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have tested authentication/authorization (if applicable)

### Performance

- [ ] My changes don't negatively impact performance
- [ ] I have optimized database queries (if applicable)
- [ ] I have considered lazy loading (if applicable)

### Accessibility

- [ ] I have tested keyboard navigation (if UI change)
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels (if UI change)
- [ ] I have tested with a screen reader (if UI change)
